step_data.thought: I've been working on removing 'Main Website' from the excluded websites list for the 'Updated General Customers' group. Looking at the current page, I can see that I'm now back at the Customer Groups listing page and there's a success message visible: 'You saved the customer group.' This indicates that my previous action of clicking the 'Save Customer Group' button was successful, and the changes (removing Main Website from the excluded websites list) have been saved. The task has been completed successfully, so I should inform the user.
step_data.action: stop('I have successfully removed Main Website from the excluded websites list for the General Retail Customers group (which appears to be the "Updated General Customers" group you referred to). The changes have been saved successfully.')
